messages.message:
Hi team,
Shouldn’t we be respecting the robots.txt protocol for scraping/indexing webpages while adding a webpage using its URL in Converse?
I added a Wikipedia page (https://wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia_talk:Changing_username) into Converse which is listed in it’s robots.txt file (https://en.wikipedia.org/robots.txt) and the page was successfully imported.
